title: If Riot actually gave a shit.
body:
So i always see the whole thing of "hey saying kys is bad because suicide"

But if riot actually cared, they would make kys censored, but hey, let's face it, they don't care, they just want to ban people so they have to pay for stuff again.

Let's just keep whiteknighting Riot, because they are totally amazing and totally always listen to their customers and not the big purse string holders.

Seriously, look at the changes since 2cent took over, and you'll notice that it's not that riot cares, it's that 2cent want's more money.

If they actually gave a shit, we wouldn't have a google approach to everything being as hands off as possible, but they don't.

Sure i can turn off censorship for swears, but lets face it, kys should still be censored, and hell, swearing is generally a bannable offense, so may as well leave the censoring on right, because we are pandering to as big a demographic as we can, because Money.

But hey, lets white knight them some more hey comments.

replies.body:
Yet again another post that has been downvoted from the white-knights because they can't comprehend a valid point against Riot.
https://imgur.com/KDOp8gE
Actually laughable.
This is why this community is retarded because half of the "toxic trolls" are actually people with reasonable points as to why Riot ISN'T A GOOD COMPANY. Wake up and realise your favourite game isn't being run by perfectionists, there is so many things wrong that have yet to be solved, or had anything done about. Notice how everything good that Riot has done: Skins, New champions, Community events, ALL INVOLVE MONEY. AS LONG AS THERE IS MONEY TO BE MADE RIOT WILL PUT ALL THEIR EFFORT INTO IT. Rather then doing something about broken matchmaking, broken balance changes, BOTS IN ARAM, broken feedback system perma banning people for "saying bad words"  and letting people who intentionally feed get away. 

And yet you choose to ignore these posts because you can't tell the difference between toxicity and CRITICISM.

Having a valid criticism isn't a reason to abuse other players, especially when it's Riot and not those other players that you have a problem with. Abusing players just makes them dismiss your argument.

I also wouldn't say Wazza is a "toxic troll", at least not in anything I've seen. So far as I know he doesn't troll in game. Do I think he has very strong opinions and is too aggressive on boards on occasion? Sure, but that doesn't mean he's a troll it means he's frustrated, and frankly I agree with the censorship bit on this one.

As far as I'm concerned, if you're toxic trolling then you're the problem, not Riot, not anyone else, no matter how valid your criticism may be, you lose any high ground you had the second you turn it on innocent players. There's a reason we delete threads abusing other players, but not those calling out Riot (valid or otherwise).

I obviously wasn't talking about threads where "other players are abused" I was addressing posts such as this where Riot is called out on things they are doing wrong. At no point within anything I wrote above was I talking about intentional troll posts. Those are the other half of the "toxic trolls", the ones that are ACTUALLY toxic. I'm referring to when the white-knights try to merge the reasonable people with the rest of the trolls and act as if they are the same. They are the people that do not get criticism, either that or they are incredibly stupid humans.

Fair enough and apologies, I misinterpreted your comment.

So long as you don't do the same with all the "white-knights". Just cause some of us (mostly) like Riot as a company doesn't mean we agree with everything. There are of course reasonable people and...stubborn people on both sides.

They censored _goddamn_ but not _kys_.

I'm laughing. Considering people are being thrown in jail for telling people to kill themselves, you'd think this would be done by now.
don't know if you guys have noticed but they have started censoring certain threads completely recently that bring up good criticisms in a normal manner.

Odd, I looked through the history and the only discussions/comments that were deleted were for clear violations of the universal rules. Is there any particular thread you had in mind that you believe has been censored?

We don't delete any content on boards so long as it adheres to the rules. Discussions won't be deleted just for being controversial or for criticising.

there was 1 that someone created about the legality of the tos etc. it just completely disappeared unless im blind. 

there was also 1 i remember commenting in that was about what a lot of threads are about recently. someone questioning their ban and it got pointed out to them it was for saying "kys" etc. it just disappeared. i can actually see a reply to my comment in "my updates", but when i try to go to the thread it says "error 404 this page has been moved or deleted".

We can only see posts deleted by moderator actions as a list, so if the OP deletes we can't see it anymore either unless we have a direct link to the post.

I believe the first thread you mention is just a bit deeper somewhere (I use the recent filter on boards, so stuff like that drops quick once people stop talking in it), but admittedly I haven't looked.

As for the second thread, I would say most likely the OP deleted the thread after being denied, I had a look through your comment history and couldn't find the post you were talking about, but if you want to know what the response was you can get me the discussion link from your notifications.
fair enough, i was unaware OP could delete the entire thread.
You can delete any content that you are the creator of essentially :)
Can confirm the second thread mentioned was deleted by the OP.

While it's understandable that Riot needs to make some money from the game (skins etc), I always found it rather bad they they decided to save money by using an automated system for punishments. Humans are always going to outsmart AI systems whether it be for better or worse, so if Riot would just spend a little more on making the game more enjoyable for everyone (e.g. hiring humans to deal with reports), in the long run it would also benefit their profit margins.
My friend got a 14 day suspension the other day and didn't get the email about why. I've never known them to be toxic in game, in fact they are usually very quiet. He considered the suspension a mistake but had to send in a support ticket to clarify what was going on. Fortunately they have a smurf account that they can use until the matter is cleared up.
As for swearing, rude words online, I've always been of the opinion that if players are too immature to handle this, then unlucky. Of course that is not Riot's policy however. They try to protect the immature players with censoring and using the automation to ban for "toxicity" and racism. But by doing this, they open up a different can of worms. Personally I'd be just dishing out the bans for ruining gameplay (e.g. disconnectors, trolls) because that is what wastes other players time the most in game, not just some text on the screen. A mature player can easily deal with stupid text on the screen, or stupid pings. Someone tells me "kys", wow man big deal. I'll give them some logic back and if they still continue personal attacks, they just get the mute button. Happens a lot.

For example the other day our team was facing the classic oce special of an all ad comp in soloqueue. We had a tank top laner and jungler. There were two idiots (Yasuo was one of them, ahem) chasing for kills and I just told them "you don't even need to fight. All you have to do is farm, buy an armour item, and push your lanes, the game will win itself. But if you keep chasing for kills and feeding then the enemies they will snowball and you won't be able to come back to that easy win condition." Of course these idiots started flaming instead of actually reading what was typed and considering it. So they got the mute button eventually. Can't educate dumbarses in 20 minutes. Not worth bothering either, with those attitudes. It's annoying to lose the game that is a free win, but its OCE, it happens.
I got a 14 day ban for saying it out of context as in Keep yourself safe.

You really need to learn to read.

I don't hate people saying kys, i'm saying that if saying kys is bannable it should be censored.
